Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System - Cefotaxime 0.0625–4 μg/mL
BD PhoenixM Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent cefotaxime (0.0625-4 µg/mL) - Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System with cefotaxime for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Streptococcus species.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility (MIC) for most Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria isolates, with this submission adding cefotaxime to Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels.
